      • CompressedFileWriter

        public CompressedFileWriter(java.lang.String outputFile,
                            java.lang.String inputFile,
                            java.lang.String[] encodingArray,
                            int programNumber,
                            int nonZeroCharacters)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Initializes the File Writer
        Parameters:
        outputFile - The name of the compressed file
        inputFile - The name of the file to be compressed
        encodingArray - The table containing each character's binary code
        programNumber - The program's ID
        nonZeroCharacters - The number of non-zero-frequency characters in the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is an error with any file
